title: Subscription
description: Contain details for the specific subscription types, such as internet, mobile, media, or landline.

ID.title: Identifier
ID.description: Unique identifier for the subscription instance.

xdm:subscriptionSKU.title: Subscription SKU
xdm:subscriptionSKU.description: Stock keeping unit (SKU), a generally unique identifier for a product.

xdm:planName.title: Plan name
xdm:planName.description: The human readable name for the subscription.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: The scope of entitlement in relation to how many people are covered by the subscription.

xdm:country.title: Country
xdm:country.description: The country that the subscription contractual and agreement terms are rooted in.

xdm:endDate.title: End date
xdm:endDate.description: The date the current subscription term ends.

xdm:term.title: Term
xdm:term.description: The numeric value of the term.

xdm:termUnitOfTime.title: Term unit of time
xdm:termUnitOfTime.description: The unit of time for the term period.

xdm:renew.title: Renew
xdm:renew.description: The agreed way that the subscription may continue after the end date.

xdm:topUp.title: Top up
xdm:topUp.description: Agreed terms for how consumable aspects of a subscription are repurchased during a billing period.

xdm:status.title: Status
xdm:status.description: The current status of the subscription.

xdm:contractID.title: Contract ID
xdm:contractID.description: Unique ID for the contract that governs this subscription.

xdm:paymentMethod.title: Payment method
xdm:paymentMethod.description: The payment method for recurring payments.

xdm:billingStartDate.title: Billing start date
xdm:billingStartDate.description: The date when the first bill is due.

xdm:chargeMethod.title: Charge method
xdm:chargeMethod.description: The way the billing is setup to charge the customer.

xdm:subscriptionCategory.title: Subscription Category
xdm:subscriptionCategory.description: The main, top level categorization of this type of subscription.

xdm:subscriptionSubCategory.title: Subscription Sub-category
xdm:subscriptionSubCategory.description: The specific sub categorization of the subscription.

xdm:devices.title: Devices
xdm:devices.description: Array of devices and/or accessories associated with the plan.

xdm:ID.title: ID
xdm:ID.description: Captures the ID for the device.

xdm:deviceFees.title: Device Fees
xdm:deviceFees.description: Captures any device fees for items such as routers, modems, recievers, etc.

xdm:deviceInsurance.title: Device Insurance
xdm:deviceInsurance.description: Tracks if a customer has opted-in to insurance for the device.

xdm:paymentOptions.title: Payment Options
xdm:paymentOptions.description: Captures if the device will be paid for in installments or full retail price.
